name: Eclipse RMF
description: RMF is a framework for working with textual requirements, structured as ReqIF models, the industry standard for exchanging requirements. RMF uses natively ReqIF, the open standard for requirements exchange, allowing you to exchange requirements with many industry applications like Rational DOORS® or PTC integrity®.

name: sphinx-needs
description: Sphinx-needs is a requirements management tool that allows you to manage requirements, specifications, and documentation within Sphinx.
